title: PTV achieves Rs 4 bln revenue target: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 30 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain said on Wednesday that Pakistan Television Corporation (PTV) has achieved a revenue target of Rs 4 billion which was biggest revenue collection in the history of the state run channel.
The PTV was completely bankrupt when Pakistan Tehreek-e-Pakistan (PTI) came to power, the minister said in a tweet.
In this short span of time, he added two channels had been digitized and the government gave the PTV a business model and today it was one of the profit earning companies.
